name: Loud Cloud the Hailstorm
text:
2+ Reptile monsters
This card cannot be targeted by your opponent’s card effects if it was Link Summoned using at least 1 WIND and 1 FIRE monsters. This card is also treated as a FIRE, and WIND attribute. You can only use each of the following effects of "Loud Cloud the Hailstorm" once per turn.
-(Quick Effect): You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; Destroy that monster, and if you do, this card gains ATK equal to twice the destroyed monster’s original ATK.
-(Quick Effect): you can banish 1 WIND and 1 FIRE monster on the field: Negate the effects of all other monsters face-up on the field until the end of the turn.
During the End Phase of the turn this card activated either of its effects: Add 1 "Loud Cloud" card from your Deck to your hand.
